descriptions.description: This is an open source project to develop and maintain the reference library for use in applications that read, create, and manipulate PNG raster image files.

set.commands: oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegimport zlib-1.2.8 oegextract libpng-1.6.3.tar.xz #configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --with-zlib-prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} # #error ZLIB_VERNUM != PNG_ZLIB_VERNUM # Problem was: CFLAGS contained -I/open-egovernment/include to zlib # maybe this helps too: --disable-dependency-tracking configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld make make install DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}/${OEG_BASE_DIR} oegarchive libpng-1.6.3
